Summary: “No one’s ever touched me. Not even in that sense- just generally. Sure, a diplomatic handshake here and there, tackling someone during training or in a fight, but nobody’s ever- and of course they wouldn’t. I’m their prince… but then there’s you, and you never- you don’t even care about any of that, and you commit treason probably once or twice every hour, and still you’ve never- Why won’t you touch me, Merlin?” Immediately, he wished he could turn back time and swallow the words back down and keep them there. He didn’t even know he was going to say them until they were floating in the air between them. He lifted his head to look at Merlin, then.
